item.title: A new start
item.description: I decided to migrate from zhangguangda.com to here, and move from digital ocean to this github pages. I feel like I don’t really need a web server for these static contents. Also I’m considering to restart my blogging. Hope this time I can actually write some stuff. Anyway, this is going to be a new start for me. Hi, guangda.me!!
